entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
